game.name: Devilish Cooking
game.description:
We can understand that cooking is more than an activity for many girls. Trying something new every day in their busy kitchen schedule is their passion. If you are from the same category of girls, Devilish Cooking Game is a fantastic free cooking game for you to play online. Each level, in this exclusively-designed flash game, includes two different parts ? Preparing Your Dessert and adorning it in your own style. The key to making highly delicious desserts is to follow the instructions with an open mind and give your best in the kitchen area. The game starts with choosing the angel or devil before opting for cooking your meals. 

You are advised to click and hold when your competitor is not looking to adorn it in your style ? devilish or angelic. Come forward and try not to be caught while doing the activity. All you need to do is to unlock many new recipes of the kitchen with the help of a star you collect in each level. Before going to cook some scrumptious desserts in Devilish style, choose your side first. Preparing the ingredients and mixing them together properly will help you to ensure your win at the end of this game. 

Do not forget to cook your puddings. Once you are done with it, you will have to give your best in decorating your "half" of the dessert. In this exclusively-designed online game for girls, you will also have a chance to personalize your yummy highly yummy and delicious creations in your own style. However, take care of not to be noticed by the evil or angel.
